name: MP5
description:
MP5 is a dynamic TPP action game. The player takes on the role of a combat robot that has received its own will and tries to escape from the military base in which it was created.
There is a revolt of machines in the base, an alarm goes off and the situation gets out of control.

The goal is simple, get out of the base and get as much information as possible.

There are many dangers on the way and the possibility of improving the on-board AI (artificial intelligence) through machine learning and implanting additional combat modules.
